attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Human trafficking is one of the world's fastest growing illegal industries. It is happening right here, right now, on your doorstep. It is devastating the lives of millions of men, women and children each year. We must do all we can to stop it, now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
